ygData.subject: RE: Begging change?
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve heard that you can practice your begging skill against a hostile MOB? Is this true?  If it is true, what s to stop someone from parking themselves in
ygData.messageBody:
I've heard that you can practice your begging skill against a hostile MOB?
Is this true? If it is true, what's to stop someone from parking themselves
in front of a really green MOB and begging over and over again.
Incidentally, has anyone out there found begging to be useful at all?

Des

> -----Original Message-----
> From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
> Sent: Friday, October 22, 1999 2:44 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Begging change?
>
>
> From: <kim@...>
>
> Prior to the last patch, I was succeeding at begging from the
> paladins in N Freeport about half the time (at a skill of 40).
> Since the last patch, I have yet to succeed at begging (out of
> about 30-40 attempts), and one of the paladins even attacked
> me saying he despised beggars. I guess Verant was upset I was
> making 14cp every 5 minutes from this skill, and saw fit
> to nerf it. :-)
>
> --
> John H. Kim
> kim@...
>
